name: Procedimientos-Uno
tag_list: architecture, engineering, software, hardware, cad, plotters
overview:
Procedimientos-Uno is an ISV that develops and markets CAD based solutions for engineering and architectural projects. The company is based in Spain and addresses the Spanish speaking market.

Among the wide range (more than seventy) of software products, the ESwin, for structural design, and the TeKton3D, for piping, hvac, etc. design, suites are the most remarkable. The company’s best selling software product is BTwin, for electrical engineering.

The company supplies architects and engineers with specialised hardware such as plotters and, in the last two years, has included technical training in its service portfolio.
